style: Woven: Purses, Card Cases, Small Objects
title: Apron
description: Flat panel of coarse stiff wool, woven in a plaid design of red, blue and green. Horizontal bands embroidered in silver (now tarnished) with additional areas in colored wools. Stylized geometric patterns. Trimmed with narrow red fringe on sides and very deep fringe of red and green at the bottom.
name: Apron
